Posted By: psychichobo (1/29/2013 2:56:21 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
He's good, but not super awesome. A seven flyer for seven mana is... well... ok. He sadly has no trample whatsoever, so can be chumpblocked by flying tokens (and there are flying token generators in this set) all day long.  
The ability is nice, but is curiously worse on such a large beater than it would be on a smaller creature. If you manage to hit a player with this guy several times, then that player is dead due to the damage anyway, no matter whether you snag some creatures or not.  
  
A difference is Commander, there this guy is already better.  
  
3/5
posts.html:
He's good, but not super awesome. A seven flyer for seven mana is... well... ok. He sadly has no trample whatsoever, so can be chumpblocked by flying tokens (and there are flying token generators in this set) all day long.
The ability is nice, but is curiously worse on such a large beater than it would be on a smaller creature. If you manage to hit a player with this guy several times, then that player is dead due to the damage anyway, no matter whether you snag some creatures or not.

A difference is Commander, there this guy is already better.

3/5
